org.gearvrf.utility

Class Threads.LifoThreadPolicyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.utility.Threads.LifoThreadPolicyProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Threads.ThreadPolicyProvider<Threads.Cancelable>
    Enclosing class:
    Threads

    public static class Threads.LifoThreadPolicyProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements Threads.ThreadPolicyProvider<Threads.Cancelable>
    Provides LIFO thread policy management: Most recently added thread proc will run next. Appropriate for image galleries, say, where most recent request is most likely to be visible. Never cancels a request!

    • Field Summary

      Fields

        public java.lang.Runnable get()

        get in interface Threads.ThreadPolicyProvider<Threads.Cancelable>

      • reschedule

        public void reschedule(Threads.Cancelable threadProc)
        Description copied from interface: Threads.ThreadPolicyProvider
        Make threadProc the next in the pool.
        • If threadProc is already in the pool, move it to the front, so get() returns it next.
        • If threadProc is not in the pool, add it at the front, so get() returns it next.
        Specified by:
        reschedule in interface Threads.ThreadPolicyProvider<Threads.Cancelable>
